caption.title: GC-FID data
caption.p: (A): GC-FID data for sunflower and rapeseed. For each sample in the table the information about species, line id and GC data for each FA are presented. (B): rapeseed GC-FID statistics. For each FA mean value, standard deviation, minimum and maximum values and coefficient of variation are presented. (C): sunflower GC-FID statistics. For each FA mean value, standard deviation, minimum and maximum values and coefficient of variation are presented.
Click here for additional data file.
